IndexPage.title: Clean Text,Format Cleaner,Text Cleaner,Format Text Online
IndexPage.description: Text-format is text format cleaner online tool,text cleaner,format text online,text format remover,strip HTML,remove characters,replace online.

textClean.h1: Text Clean and Text Format and Format Cleaner
textClean.h1_desc: Text-Format is an all-in-one text cleaning and text formatting online tool that can perform many simple and complex text operations including format text, clean text, remove line breaks, strip HTML, convert case, find and replace text. Using Text-Format allows you to quickly get a clean and tidy text content without having to do tedious manual work.
textClean.default_text: Welcome to Text-Format. Paste your text here
textClean.line_to_left: to the left of each line.
textClean.line_to_right: to the right of each line.
textClean.h2_1_p: Text-Format & Format Cleaner is a powerful web-based tool designed to manipulate and format text according to user preferences. This tool offers a range of functionalities including the removal of punctuation, emojis, non-ASCII characters, and emails, as well as HTML tag manipulation and line-based operations. Whether you need to clean up text for analysis, prepare content for publication, or just enhance readability, Text-Format provides an intuitive interface and a comprehensive set of features to meet your text processing needs.
textClean.h2_2_p: Using Text-Format is straightforward and user-friendly. Here’s a step-by-step guide to help you get started:
textClean.h2_2_h3_1_p: Begin by pasting or typing your content into the provided textarea on the webpage.
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_p: Check the boxes for the operations you want to apply to your text. The available operations include:
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_h4_1_p: Remove punctuation, strip emojis, remove non-ASCII characters, remove non-alphanumeric characters, and remove emails.
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_h4_2_p: Unescape HTML tags, remove all HTML tags, remove HTML IDs and classes, decode HTML character entities, and decode URL-encoded characters.
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_h4_3_p: Add specific content to the left or right of each line, remove characters from the left or right of each line.
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_h4_4_p: Find specific content and replace it with another, replace spaces with tabs or vice versa.
textClean.h2_2_h3_3_p: Once you’ve selected the desired operations, click the 'Clean Text' button to process the text according to your selections.
textClean.h2_2_h3_4_p: Use the buttons provided to perform additional actions like removing extra spaces, empty lines, or line breaks, changing case (uppercase, lowercase, capitalize sentences or words), removing duplicate lines, copying text to the clipboard, or clearing the textarea.
textClean.h2_3_p_1: Text-Format offers a comprehensive suite of features designed to cater to all your text manipulation needs. Below is a detailed overview of the functionalities provided by Text-Format:
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_1_p: Automatically strip all punctuation marks from your text to create a clean, streamlined document.
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_2_p: emove all emojis from your content, ensuring that only alphanumeric characters and standard symbols remain.
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_3_p: Eliminate all non-ASCII characters, which is especially useful for preparing text for systems that only support ASCII encoding.
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_4_p: Strip out any characters that are not letters or numbers, resulting in purely alphanumeric text.
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_5_p: Detect and remove email addresses from the content, useful for privacy concerns or data anonymization.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_1_p: Convert HTML entities back to their corresponding characters, making the text more readable.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_2_p: Strip all HTML tags from your content, leaving only the raw content.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_3_p: Remove ID attributes from HTML elements in the content, useful for cleaning up copied HTML code.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_4_p: Strip class attributes from HTML elements, simplifying the HTML structure.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_5_p: Replace HTML character entities with their actual characters, enhancing text readability.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_6_p: Convert URL-encoded characters back to their original form, making URLs and other encoded content easier to read.
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_1: Add Text to Left of Each Line
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_1_p: Add specific content to the beginning of each line, useful for formatting lists or code.
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_2: Add Text to Right of Each Line
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_2_p: Append content to the end of each line, useful for annotations or comments.
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_3: Remove Characters from Left of Each Line
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_3_p: Remove a specified number of characters from the beginning of each line.
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_4: Remove Characters from Right of Each Line
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_4_p: Remove a specified number of characters from the end of each line.
textClean.h2_3_h3_4_h4_1_p: Search for specific content and replace it with another, useful for quick edits and corrections.
textClean.h2_3_h3_4_h4_2_p: Convert a specified number of consecutive spaces into a single tab character, useful for code formatting.
textClean.h2_3_h3_4_h4_3_p: Convert tabs into spaces, useful for adjusting indentation and spacing in text.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_1_p: Remove all extra spaces from the content, leaving only single spaces between words.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_2_p: Delete all empty lines from the content, useful for consolidating content.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_3_p: Convert line breaks into spaces, transforming multiline content into a single continuous line.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_4_p: Convert all characters in the text to uppercase.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_5_p: Convert all characters in the text to lowercase.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_6_p: Capitalize the first letter of each sentence, useful for proper formatting.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_7_p: Capitalize the first letter of each word.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_8_p: Eliminate duplicate lines from the text, leaving only unique lines.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_9_p: Easily copy the formatted text to the clipboard for use in other applications.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_10_p: Quickly clear all text from the input area, readying it for new content.
textClean.h2_3_p_2: By combining these powerful features, Text-Format allows users to effortlessly clean, format, and manipulate text, making it an indispensable tool for writers, editors, developers, data analysts, and more. Whether you need to prepare text for publication, coding, data analysis, or any other application, Text-Format provides the tools you need to get the job done efficiently.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy ｜ Text-Format
privacyPolicy.description: This Privacy Policy outlines how Text-Format collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our website.
privacyPolicy.desc: Thank you for choosing Text-Format! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website located at text-format.com.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pa: a. Personal Data: Text-Format operates entirely on the client-side and does not collect or store any personal data.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pb: b. Non-Personal Data: We may use web cookies to enhance your browsing experience, but no personal data is collected or stored.
privacyPolicy.h4_2_p: Since Text-Format operates on the client-side, no data collection occurs, and all processing is done locally on your device.
privacyPolicy.h4_3_p: We do not share any data with third parties as no data is collected or stored by Text-Format.
privacyPolicy.h4_4_p: Text-Format does not collect any personal data from users, including children. All operations are conducted locally on the user's device.
privacyPolicy.h4_5_p: We will notify users of any updates to this Privacy Policy by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacyPolicy.h4_6_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

deleteFormat.title: Delete Format - Remove Text Formatting Online,remove format
deleteFormat.description: Delete Format - Free online tool to remove text formatting, spaces, newlines and other formatting characters
deleteFormat.h1_desc: Free online tool to remove text formatting, spaces, newlines and other formatting characters
deleteFormat.about_desc: Delete Format is a free online tool that helps you remove unwanted formatting from your text.
deleteFormat.feature_1_desc: Our text formatting remover offers a clean and intuitive interface, making it easy for users of all skill levels to navigate. Simply paste your text into the tool, and with one click, you can strip away unwanted formatting, ensuring a hassle-free experience.
deleteFormat.feature_2_desc: Experience immediate results with our formatting removal tool. As soon as you input your text, the automatic processing occurs in real-time, allowing you to see and copy the cleaned text without waiting for long processing times.
deleteFormat.feature_3_desc: This tool effectively removes various text formatting issues, including spaces, newlines, tabs, and special characters. Whether you're working with plain text, HTML, or other formats, our tool will seamlessly clean your content for better usability.
deleteFormat.feature_4_desc: Enjoy the convenience of a free online tool designed to simplify your text editing tasks. No subscriptions or hidden fees—just quick and easy formatting removal whenever you need it.
deleteFormat.feature_5_desc: We value your privacy, which is why our tool does not store any data or text you input. Once you clean your text, all information is deleted, ensuring your content remains secure and private.
deleteFormat.feature_6_desc: Access our text formatting removal tool from any device with an internet connection. Compatible with all browsers and operating systems, it allows you to clean your text efficiently whether you're on a desktop, tablet, or smartphone.
deleteFormat.faq_1_title: What is the purpose of a text formatting remover?
deleteFormat.faq_1_desc: A text formatting remover is an online tool designed to strip away all types of text formatting from your content. This includes removing spaces, newlines, tabs, and special characters. By using this tool, you can easily clean up your text for a more uniform appearance or to prepare it for further processing.
deleteFormat.faq_2_title: How does the online tool work?
deleteFormat.faq_2_desc: The online tool to remove text formatting works by analyzing the input text and identifying elements such as extra spaces, line breaks, and other formatting features. Once detected, it eliminates these unwanted characters to provide you with clean, formatted text. Simply paste your text into the tool, and it will process the content instantly.
deleteFormat.faq_3_title: Is there a cost associated with using this tool?
deleteFormat.faq_3_desc: No, our online text formatting remover is completely free to use! You can access it anytime without any signup or hidden fees. Just visit the website, paste your text, and click the 'Remove Formatting' button to get started.
deleteFormat.faq_4_title: Can this tool handle large volumes of text?
deleteFormat.faq_4_desc: Yes, our text formatting remover can handle large volumes of text efficiently. However, for extremely large texts, it is advised to break them into smaller sections to ensure smooth processing. Regardless of the size, the tool is designed to quickly deliver clean text without extensive waiting times.
deleteFormat.faq_5_title: What formats can I remove with this tool?
deleteFormat.faq_5_desc: Our online text formatting remover can handle various types of content, including plain text, HTML markup, and text from word processors. It effectively strips out formatting characters like font size, style, hyperlinks, and paragraph breaks, providing you with a clean text output suitable for multiple applications.
deleteFormat.faq_6_title: Is my data secure when using this online tool?
deleteFormat.faq_6_desc: Absolutely! We prioritize your privacy and data security. The tool operates on a secure server, and no text you input is stored or recorded. Once you remove the formatting and receive your clean text, all data is promptly deleted from our systems.

formatHtml.title: Format HTML Online - HTML Formatter, HTML Beautifier
formatHtml.description: Format HTML Online - Free online HTML formatter and beautifier to format and beautify your HTML code with proper indentation
formatHtml.h1_desc: Free online HTML formatter and beautifier to format and beautify your HTML code with proper indentation
formatHtml.about_desc: Our HTML Formatter is a free online tool that helps you format and beautify your HTML code. It adds proper indentation and spacing to make your code more readable and maintainable.
formatHtml.feature_1_desc: Our HTML formatter offers a clean and intuitive interface, making it easy for anyone to input and format their code. Whether you're a seasoned developer or a beginner, you'll find it simple to paste your HTML and get instant results.
formatHtml.feature_2_desc: Enjoy the benefits of our online HTML beautifier completely free of charge. There are no downloads or installations required, and you can access our service from any device with internet connectivity.
formatHtml.feature_3_desc: The HTML formatter ensures your code is properly indented and organized. This makes it easier to read and maintain your code, which is essential for developers who want to ensure high coding standards.
formatHtml.feature_4_desc: See your formatted HTML in real-time. As you input your code, our tool instantly displays the beautified version, allowing you to make adjustments on-the-fly and ensuring your final output is just right.
formatHtml.feature_5_desc: Our online HTML formatter is designed to work seamlessly across all major web browsers. Whether you're using Chrome, Firefox, or Safari, you'll experience consistent performance and formatting results.
formatHtml.faq_1_desc: An HTML formatter is a tool or software that takes unformatted or poorly formatted HTML code and organizes it into a more readable and structured format. It adds proper indentation and spacing to the code, which improves its readability and makes it easier for developers to work with.
formatHtml.faq_2_title: Why should I use an online HTML beautifier?
formatHtml.faq_2_desc: Using an online HTML beautifier provides a quick and convenient way to clean up your HTML code without the need for installing software. It can save you time by automatically applying consistent formatting and making your code look professional and easy to understand.
formatHtml.faq_3_title: Is the online HTML formatter free to use?
formatHtml.faq_3_desc: Yes, our online HTML formatter is completely free to use. You can format and beautify your HTML code without any cost, making it accessible for everyone, from beginners to experienced developers.
formatHtml.faq_4_title: How do I use the HTML beautifier?
formatHtml.faq_4_desc: To use the HTML beautifier, simply paste your unformatted HTML code into the provided text area and click the 'Format' button. The tool will process your code and display the beautified version, which you can then copy and use in your projects.
formatHtml.faq_5_title: Can I format large HTML files with the tool?
formatHtml.faq_5_desc: Yes, our online HTML formatter can handle large HTML files; however, performance may vary depending on file size and complexity. For optimal results, it's recommended to break down extremely large files or use the tool for parts of your code.
formatHtml.faq_6_title: Is my code safe when using the online formatter?
formatHtml.faq_6_desc: Yes, your code is safe when using our online HTML formatter. We do not store or share your code after formatting. Your privacy is important to us, and we ensure a secure and private experience while using our tool.
